name: Eggscellent Collision
description: In Eggscellent Collision, you play as a chef on a mission to cook the perfect egg dish. But before you can achieve culinary perfection, you must first create the right conditions by colliding a frying pan with a flame and an egg. As you progress through the levels, the challenges become more difficult, requiring precise timing and strategic positioning to get your ingredients to collide just right. With colorful graphics and addictive gameplay, Eggscellent Collision is sure to satisfy your appetite for fun and challenge your cooking skills! Please note that this game was created quickly in just 21 minutes, so the quality may not be up to the standard of more polished games. We hope you'll still enjoy the fun and challenge of Eggscellent Collision
